name: Chow-Chow My Nuts (Low Budget Recipe)
description:
Simple 3 ingredients recipe.
let it sit for a couple of days for the nuts to calm and the cream to pop!

ELR Link: http://tjek.nu/r/pt3Z
author: ooooNaSuGamisoooo

reviews.text: This is soooo good! I can’t believe I’m the first to review it. Calipipitter Chow is such a great flavour and already pretty complex so just adding the equally lovely JF Bavarian Cream was genius. I made a 10ml tester and tried it after letting it steep for 4 days. It tastes like a big bowl of thick cream with a really great caramel mixed in, caramelised roasted nuts and wafer biscuit sprinkled on top- that’s what I get anyway. It’s not too sweet but just sweet enough.
